It's an awesome program, and as long as you follow the instructions you can be on your way to using an INCREDIBLE iphoto alternative.

This works perfectly.  I already had version 1.1, so I cannot answer the problems some folks here have had.  Also, there is a new upgrade 1.4.1 that I just downloaded and installed without a problem.  Thanks "nimq"!
